name: Moonfall (itch) (airell, olverr)
description:
Made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 130: Lunar

Limitation: 10 Seconds 

This is a small platformer where you play as an astronaut with an oxygen tank. Your oxygen tank only lasts you 10 seconds. You can even dash but it'll use your oxygen so you'll have to be careful. Collect the oxygen tanks to refill your oxygen. Make it past level 5 to win.

FYI: This is my first completed game and Oliver's second.
